mapper.select: select c.id , c.groupname , c.groupintroduce , c.nickname , c.groupnum from community c , group_user g where c.GROUPNUM = g.GROUPNUM and c.GROUP_MASTER = 1 order by groupnum desc
select * from community where id = #{id} order by group_master desc
select * from community where group_master = 1 and groupnum = #{num}
select * from group_user where groupname = #{groupname} and groupintroduce = #{groupintroduce}
select count(*) from community where id = #{id} and group_master = 1
select count(*) from community where id = #{id} and groupnum = #{groupnum}
select id , nickname , to_char(inputdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') as inputdate , title , content , bnum_group from groupboard where groupnum = #{groupnum} order by bnum_group desc
select groupnum from groupboard where bnum_group = #{bnum_group}
